byline: Queena Kim, Amy Scott, Kai Ryssdal, Karen Clark and Sabri Ben-Achour
title: Marketplace for Monday, September 16, 2013
description: People are asking who the next Fed chair will be: we want to know more about what he or she actually does. And while Colorado is one of the best-prepared states when it comes to handling snow and hail, it's not set up to deal with torrential rain.
teaser: People are asking who the next Fed chair will be: we want to know more about what he or she actually does. And while Colorado is one of the best-prepared states when it comes to handling snow and hail, it's not set up to deal with torrential rain.
